edit-app.ssh-restart-warning: Note: Enabling or disabling SSH Access will restart all application instances.
edit-app.ssh-no-edit: Note: SSH Access for this application can not be modified as the Space is set to disallow all SSH access.

terminate-instance.title: Terminate Instance
terminate-instance.description: Are you sure you want to terminate instance {{index}}?
terminate-instance.error-message: There was a problem terminating this instance. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.

simple.title: Delete Application
simple.description: Are you sure you want to delete '{{appName}}'?

unbind.title: Detach Service
unbind.description: Are you sure you want to detach {{name}}?
unbind.error-message: There was a problem detaching this service. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.
unbind.error: Some applications failed to detach from the service instance

delete.title: Delete Service
delete.description: Are you sure you want to delete {{name}}?
delete.error-message: There was a problem deleting this service. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the Administrator.

notifications.success: The '{{ service }}' service has been successfully attached to application '{{ appName }}'
notifications.failure-create: There was a problem creating the instance. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.
notifications.failure-bind: There was a problem binding the service instance to the application. Please try again. If this error persists, please contact the administrator.

variables.deleteError: An error occurred deleting this variable. Please try again.
